message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, which I believe will be highly valuable to your business.  I'm asking for $950,000 for it.  Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I believe it's a great product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Bob, I understand you're working with a budget, and I appreciate your interest in the product.  I'm willing to come down a bit from my original offer.  How about $900,000? This price still reflects the value of the product, but gives you a good deal. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to come down, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $875,000. I'm still interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget. Can you meet me at this price?
